title: Blank Cordova Starter
tooltip: Use this template to develop cross-platform mobile app that can be built to run on various mobile devices as well as in a mobile browser. This template has all the device initialization code necessary for creating mobile app using Cordova or IntelXDK APIs.
description: Use this template to develop cross-platform mobile app that can be built to run on various mobile devices as well as in a mobile browser. This template has all the device initialization code necessary for creating mobile app using Cordova or IntelXDK APIs.
